section.title: Introduction to Modern Technologies
section.para: This document provides an overview of modern technologies with researched entities.
The following technologies have been researched for accuracy and attribution.

section.title: Artificial Intelligence
section.para: Machine Learning is a fundamental component of modern AI systems.
section.definition:
Machine Learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.
Stanford AI Lab Mitchell's Definition

section.title: Web Technologies
section.para: GraphQL has gained significant adoption in API development.
section.definition:
GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for executing those queries against your data. It was developed by Facebook in 2012 and released as open source in 2015.
GraphQL Official Documentation

section.title: Conclusion
section.para: The technologies described in this document represent key components of modern software development.
